metadata.title: CVE-2023-4237 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the Ansible Automation Platform. When creating a newkeypair, the ec2_key module prints out the private key directly to thestandard output. This flaw allows an attacker to fetch those keys from thelog files, compromising the system's confidentiality, integrity, andavailability.

criterions.comment: ansible package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
